malala krida, pihinum, badmintan, bich wolibol, oru padima ha tenis krida wenuwen kridaka kridikawan 9k ha niladharin 8k yowun olimpik krida ulelata ekwethi.anuradha widusankha (malala krida-mi.400 kadulu), michiko rahim, mathiw abesinha (pihinum), thilini hendahewa, sachin dayas (badmintan), chamika sandaruwan, isuru madhushan (bich wolibol), wishan mariyo (oru padima) ha shamal disanayaka (tenis) shri lankawa niyojanaya kirime awasthawa himikara gena atha.pasugiya wasare chinaye nanjinhi pawathi yowun aasiyanu krida uleledi lokada padakkam dinu anuradha widusankha ha mathiw abesinha mewara supurudu kridanganawaladima tharaga wadime awasthawa himikara ganima wishesha wasiyakwa thibe.yowun olimpik krida ulela dewani warata pawathwena athara methek shri lankawa padakkam dina ganime awasthawa udakaragena nomatha.awasanwarata 2010di singappuruwe pawathi yowun olimpik ulelata krida 4k yatathe shri lankawen kridaka kridikawan 7k sahabhagi wiya.me athara krida ulela pawathwena kalaya atharathura nanjin nuwaradi fes buk ha tuwitar samaja web adawi kriyathmaka kirimata china rajaya awasaradi athayi wartha we.china jathikayanta ema samaja web adawiwalata piwisimata awasarayak nomathi athara antharjathika olimpik kamituwe illimak anuwa thawakalikawa wiwruthawana bawa erata rajaya pawasayi.
mudal amathyansha web adawiye me wana witath athi ayawaya asthamenthu salakillen pariksha kalahoth pilithura soyaganima apahasu natha.
